recipes.name: Udon Noodle Stir Fry
recipes.method:
1. Cook udon noodles according to package instructions. 
2. In a wok or large pan, heat sesame oil over high heat. 
3. Add sliced beef and cook until browned. 
4. Add onion, garlic, and bell peppers and stir fry for 2-3 minutes. 
5. Add soy sauce, oyster sauce, salt, and pepper. 
6. Add cooked udon noodles and stir fry for another 2-3 minutes. 
7. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Teriyaki Salmon
recipes.method:
1. In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, mirin, sake, brown sugar, ginger, and garlic. 
2. Heat vegetable oil in a large pan over medium-high heat. 
3. Add salmon fillets and cook for 2-3 minutes on each side. 
4. Pour the teriyaki sauce over the salmon and continue cooking for another 2-3 minutes, until the sauce thickens and the salmon is cooked through. 
5. Serve hot with steamed rice and vegetables.

recipes.name: Pesto Pasta
recipes.method:
1. Cook pasta according to package instructions. 
2. Drain the pasta and return it to the pot. 
3. Add the pesto sauce and parmesan cheese. 
4. Stir until the pasta is coated in the sauce. 
5. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Beef Stew
recipes.method:
1. Cut the beef into bite-sized pieces. 
2. In a pot, brown the beef over medium heat. 
3. Add the onion and garlic and cook until softened. 
4. Add the chopped tomatoes, tomato puree, thyme, rosemary, salt and pepper. 
5. Add enough water to cover the ingredients. 
6. Simmer for 2 hours. 
7. Add the carrots and potatoes and simmer for another hour. 
8. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Roast Chicken
recipes.method:
1. Preheat the oven to 200Â°C. 
2. Cut one lemon in half and stuff it inside the chicken. 
3. Cut the other lemon into slices and place them around the chicken. 
4. Crush the garlic cloves and mix them with the thyme, rosemary, salt and pepper. 
5. Rub the mixture all over the chicken.
. Roast the chicken for 1 hour and 30 minutes or until the juices run clear. 
7. Let the chicken rest for 10 minutes before carving. 
8. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.method:
1. Cut the peppers and onion into thin strips. 
2. Crush the garlic cloves. 
3. In a pan, heat some oil over high heat. 
4. Add the peppers, onion and garlic and stir fry for 2-3 minutes. 
5. In a small bowl, mix together the soy sauce, oyster sauce, cornstarch, water, salt and pepper. 
6. Add the sauce to the pan and stir fry for another 2-3 minutes. 
7. Serve hot with rice.

recipes.name: Beef Burger
ingredients: Lettuce, tomato, and condiments of your choice
recipes.method:
1. In a bowl, mix together the minced beef, onion, egg, breadcrumbs, salt and pepper. 
2. Divide the mixture into 4 equal portions and shape them into patties. 
3. Heat a grill or frying pan over medium-high heat. 
4. Cook the patties for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until cooked to your liking. 
5. Toast the burger buns and place a slice of cheese on each patty. 
6. Assemble the burgers with lettuce, tomato, and condiments of your choice. 
7. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Fish Tacos
ingredients: Lettuce, tomato, and salsa of your choice
recipes.method:
1. Cut the fish fillets into small pieces. 
2. In a bowl, mix together the flour, paprika, cumin, garlic powder, salt and pepper. 
3. In another bowl, whisk together the beer and egg. 
4. Dip the fish pieces into the flour mixture, then into the beer mixture, and finally into the breadcrumbs. 
5. Heat some oil in a pan over medium-high heat. 
6. Fry the fish pieces for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until golden brown. 
7. Warm the tortillas in the oven or microwave. 
8. Assemble the tacos with lettuce, tomato, and salsa of your choice. 
9. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.method:
1. In a pot, heat the broth over low heat. 
2. In a separate pot, heat the olive oil over medium heat. 
3. Add the onion and garlic and cook until softened. 
4. Add the rice and stir until coated in the oil. 
5. Add a ladleful of broth to the rice and stir until absorbed. 
6. Continue adding broth, one ladleful at a time, and stirring until absorbed. 
7. After about 20 minutesor when the rice is cooked but still slightly firm to the bite. 
. In a separate pan, sautÃ© the mushrooms in butter until tender. 
9. Add the mushrooms and parmesan cheese to the rice and stir until combined. 
10. Season with salt and pepper to taste. 
11. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Chocolate Brownies
recipes.method:
1. Preheat the oven to 180Â°C. 
2. In a bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until light and fluffy. 
3. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla extract. 
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the cocoa powder, flour, salt and baking powder. 
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the butter mixture, stirring until well combined. 
6. Pour the batter into a greased baking dish. 
7. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean. 
8. Let the brownies cool before cutting into squares. 
9. Serve and enjoy!

recipes.name: Beef Stir-Fry
recipes.method:
1. Cut the beef into thin strips. 
2. Slice the peppers and onion. 
3. In a bowl, mix together the soy sauce, honey, cornstarch, ginger powder, salt, and pepper. 
4. In a wok or large skillet, heat some oil over high heat. 
5. Add the beef and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until browned. 
6. Add the garlic and stir-fry for another minute. 
7. Add the peppers and onion and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until tender. 
8. Pour in the soy sauce mixture and stir-fry for another minute until the sauce thickens. 
9. Serve over rice.

recipes.name: Creamy Mushroom Pasta
recipes.method:
1. Cook the pasta according to package instructions. 
2. Slice the mushrooms and mince the garlic. 
3. In a pan, sautÃ© the mushrooms over medium heat until tender. 
4. Add the garlic and cook for another minute. 
5. Pour in the heavy cream and add the thyme, salt, and pepper. 
6. Let simmer until the sauce thickens. 
7. Add the parmesan cheese and stir until melted. 
8. Serve the sauce over the cooked pasta.
